interpretation: The "enraged face" emoji represents intense anger and frustration. It is a warning sign to keep your distance, as the person or situation may be volatile and unpredictable. This card can also indicate a need to release pent-up emotions and find healthy ways to channel your anger. Be careful not to let your rage consume you or lead to destructive behavior. Instead, use it as a motivator to make positive changes in your life. Associated keywords include fury, wrath, temper, explosive, and passionate. When this card appears in a reading, it is a call to acknowledge and address your anger before it spirals out of control.
